• Mar 24, 2017

    12. mr. yuk Web VR

    Currently working with Brendan Luu to create a web virtual reality exhibition. We are exploring creating an exhibit on the topics of art and music. Our goal is to create an experience that makes virtual reality more enjoyable for those who don't have access to all of the hardware needed to use VR. For this reason we are creating a web experience. I have been learning how to create VR experiences with A-Frame. Check out a prototype I have created of Mr. Yuk here.

  • Mar 24, 2017

    11. Building a web document editor.

    Creating a web document editor that will allow users to easily write what comes to their mind in their browser. Currently the product has multiple pages and I am working on adding local storage for instant saving. Next, I want to add a chrome extension and the ability to embed links.

    Created a loading animation for the new eego logo mark. The eyes are blinking.

  • Feb 26, 2017

    07. Some guy I came across on google maps...

    Many products overlook their early adopters. Without them, what would their product be? As eego continues to grow, closer to, launch I would like to acknowledge our early adopters by creating a page dedicated to them. It will increase engagement and add incentive to become a part of our growing creative community... More on this in the near future.

    This guy agrees.

  • Feb 23, 2017

    05. eego V1.01 feed concept.

    Users will have the ability add profile picture, and a coverp photo to their eego. We want users to be proud of their collections, so we are adding the ability to share them. Keeping track of the people users like the most can be difficult so we want to give users the ability to "follow" others. We are experimenting with the word "watching" because it feels less social. The eego logo mark will direct the user to a feed of collected content from people the user is "following" or "watching"... more coming soon on this :)

  • Feb 20, 2017

    04. Rainbow custom cards and music player

    Next our team has decided to add custom cards and player to Rainbow, which will allow users to listen to music with out stopping. In addition, custom players will allow us to create light weight music cards which will be easier to load then the soundcloud embeds.

    The display below shows how a user selects a person to see their likes and the new player cards on mobile.

  • Feb 16, 2017

    03. eego - a place to create collections for your workflow.

    After busting my brain a little longer, I came up with eego. We want users collections to resemeble oneself, similar to an eego.

  • Feb 12, 2017

    01. This is an activity sheet.

    My previous activity sheet gave me a weird taste in my mouth so I created a new one. Here is a link to the previous one.

    Over the weekend Ryan, Sid and I completed our first working version of Rainbow. The experience displays a list of the people the user is following on Soundcloud. When a user selects a person they area able to view their likes. Next we are working on creating our own custom player and building the experience on mobile.
